The Squirrel's Secret: A Nutty Adventure Game - In this game, players take on the role of a squirrel named Nutmeg, who is on a mission to uncover the truth behind the mysterious disappearance of all the acorns in the forest. As Nutmeg, players must explore different areas of the forest, solve puzzles, and gather clues to uncover the culprit behind the missing acorns. Along the way, they will encounter various forest creatures who will offer help or hindrances to their quest. The game will have a mix of platforming, puzzle-solving, and adventure elements, with a unique art style inspired by watercolor paintings.

The Squirrel's Secret Society - In this game, players are part of a secret society of squirrels who are determined to protect their forest home from threats both within and outside of their community. As a member of the society, players must complete tasks and missions to prove their worth and earn the respect of their fellow squirrels. The game will have a mix of strategy, role-playing, and puzzle-solving elements, with a focus on cooperation and teamwork. The game's art style will be inspired by ancient woodcuts and will feature a unique color palette.

Squirreled Away - In this game, players are tasked with rebuilding a forest that has been destroyed by a group of mischievous raccoons. As they rebuild, players must also uncover the truth behind the raccoons' actions and stop them from causing further damage. The game will have a mix of city-building, resource management, and adventure elements, with a unique art style inspired by hand-drawn illustrations.

The Great Acorn Heist - In this game, players take on the role of a detective squirrel who is tasked with solving the mystery of the missing acorns in the forest. As the detective, players must gather clues, interview forest creatures, and solve puzzles to uncover the culprit behind the heist. The game will have a mix of detective work, puzzle-solving, and adventure elements, with a unique art style inspired by vintage comic strips.
